verses.name: Jeremiah 10:21
verses.text: For the pastors are become brutish, and have not sought the Lord: therefore they shall not prosper, and all their flocks shall be scattered.

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:22
verses.text: Behold, the noise of the bruit is come, and a great commotion out of the north country, to make the cities of Judah desolate, and a den of dragons.

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:23
verses.text: O Lord, I know that the way of man is not in himself: it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:24
verses.text: O Lord, correct me, but with judgment; not in thine anger, lest thou bring me to nothing.
